Articles.Content:
OK, remember my last thread? My failed Mun mission?

Yes, I did some modifications to it and now it can go to orbit with the 1st stage!

So,with some modifications(little)it will be Duna capable!(hopefully).

Here's a screenshot of it at the launchpad:

.....................................................................................................................

http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y413/Daniel34559/screenshot0_zps2a07483b.png

......................................................................................................................

p.s: I was going to land on the Mun and then, it started to shake, and the shaking exploded it completely:D

R.I.P Bill Kerman;.;

And I am doing the modifications now, briefly, I will post a reply to this thread to tell the progress.
Hmmmm, it might work... I don't know. Is there a nuclear engine on it? Parachutes and landing legs?
Yes, the rocket is prepared(modified) to the launch, just wait till Duna comes close...
